snippet.title: Mech Shuffle Trailer | Roguelike Deck Builder
snippet.description:
New #MechShuffle #trailer showing off Content Patch 1.05. The patch includes: Updated Sprites for mechs and terrain, Assault Class mechs, match rewards (events, lore, mech labs), 50 New Cards (now at 150+ cards), new Token types (fortify armour), improved accessibility, and tons more!

Mech Shuffle is a perfect information roguelite deck builder where you choose a pilot and a mech to build a unique deck. Earn new cards and card upgrades to improve your deck over a run. Scout the battlefield, secure the beachhead, and repel the invasion! It is a #roguelike/#roguelite deck building card game.  The game is an indie game in #earlyaccess, and will continue to see new content and more features as game development progresses.

Firebrand by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons  Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100830
Artist: http://incompetech.com/

Mech Shuffle on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2075760/Mech_Shuffle/
